data.text:
About game:

All the love Splinter Cell Double Agent got a continue. And now the hero Sam Fisher appears before a new problem that has arisen in its path. Former employers, opened at the former agent of the "Third echelon" of the hunting season. He is forced to go into hiding. Sam finds out, after some time, that the state apparatus of the United States, corruption has surpassed all is not conceivable boundaries, and that his colleague, once specialist to provide technical and communications support to agents of Splinter Cell, Anna, is in danger.
